name: Home Office Deduction
description: Simplified method: $5 per sq ft, max 300 sq ft ($1,500)

description: 100% deduction for self-employed health insurance premiums

description: Qualified Business Income deduction for pass-through entities (up to 20%)

description: Full deduction for SEP-IRA contributions up to 25% of net SE income

description: Professional/consulting services generally exempt from sales tax

name: Entertainment Expense
description: Entertainment expenses are NOT deductible (0% after TCJA)
